mantras.title: Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्। उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान् मृत्योर्मुक्षीय मामृतात्॥
mantras.transliteration: Om Tryambakam Yajamahe Sugandhim Pushtivardhanam | Urvarukamiva Bandhanan Mrityormukshiya Mamritat ||
mantras.translation: We worship the three-eyed One (Lord Shiva) who is fragrant and who nourishes all beings; may He liberate us from death for the sake of immortality.

mantras.title: Shiva Gayatri Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: ॐ तत्पुरुषाय विद्महे महादेवाय धीमहि तन्नो रुद्रः प्रचोदयात्॥
mantras.transliteration: Om Tatpurushaya Vidmahe Mahadevaya Dhimahi Tanno Rudrah Prachodayat ||
mantras.translation: Om, Let me meditate on the great Purusha, Oh, greatest God, give me higher intellect, And let God Rudra illuminate my mind.

mantras.title: Rudra Mantra
mantras.translation: Om, I bow to Lord Rudra.

mantras.title: Shiva Dhyaan Mantra
mantras.sanskrit: करचरणकृतं वाक्कायजं कर्मजं वा। श्रवणनयनजं वा मानसं वाऽपराधं। विहितमविहितं वा सर्व मेतत् क्षमस्व। जय जय करुणाब्धे श्री महादेव शम्भो॥
mantras.transliteration: Karcharankritam Vakkayajam Karmajam Va, Shravananayanajam Va Manasam Vaaparadham, Vihitamavihitam Va Sarva Metat Kshamasva, Jaya Jaya Karunabdhe Shri Mahadeva Shambho
mantras.translation: Whatever sins I have committed with my hands, feet, voice, body, actions, ears, eyes, or mind, whether forbidden or not, please forgive them all. Hail, hail, ocean of compassion, Shri Mahadeva Shambho.
